concept.title: What Are Multimedia Proactive Commands
concept.shortdesc: This section describes the multimedia proactive commands

conbody.p: The multimedia proactive commands request the device to handle the multimedia messages (MMS). The telephony system uses these instructions to display the multimedia messages to the user.

section.title: Mulitmedia proactive command functions
section.p: The multimedia proactive commands allow the client applications to:

li.p: request the telephony system to send a MMS.
request the telephony system to retrieve a MMS from the network.
request the user interface to display a MMS to the user.
set the frame for split screen display. More than one image or message can be displayed to the users.
A frame describes the display parameters of the device.
